sense.gloss: to enter, to come in, to go in, to get in, to arrive
to join (a club, company, etc.), to enter (a university, the army, etc.), to enroll (in), to go into (e.g. politics), to get into
to be contained (in), to be included (in), to be inside (e.g. a box), to come under (a heading), to belong (in a category)
to (be able to) fit (in a container, building, etc.), to be (able to be) held, to be (able to be) accommodated
to be introduced, to be brought in, to be installed
to be received, to be obtained
to be scored (of points), to be won (of votes)
to turn on, to start functioning, to start working
to enter (a month, season, etc.), to reach (e.g. a climax), to get to (e.g. the main topic), to enter into (e.g. negotiations), to start (doing), to begin
to form (of a crack, fissure, etc.), to develop
to be put in (of effort, spirit, feeling, etc.), to be applied (e.g. of strength)
to be ready (of tea, coffee, etc.), to be made
to enter the body (of alcohol), to become drunk

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓はネッシーなんて↑架空↑↓かくう↓の↑存在↑↓そんざい↓だと↑言↑↓い↓うが、↑僕↑↓ぼく↓|はいる|と↑思↑↓おも↓うよ。
sdata.e: You say Nessie is an imaginary being, but I think she exists.

sdata.j: ↑教室↑↓きょうしつ↓に↑入↑↓|はい↓る|↑時↑↓とき↓は↑帽子↑↓ぼうし↓を↑脱↑↓ぬ↓ぎなさい。
sdata.e: Take off your hat when you enter a classroom.

sdata.j: ↑教室↑↓きょうしつ↓に↑入↑↓|はい↓る|なり、↑先生↑↓せんせい↓は↑突然↑↓とつぜん↓↑怒↑↓おこ↓ったような↑口調↑↓くちょう↓で↑話↑↓はな↓しはじめた。
sdata.e: As soon as he entered the classroom, our teacher burst into angry speech.

sdata.j: ↑許可↑↓きょか↓なしに↑部屋↑↓へや↓に↑入↑↓|はい↓る|な。
sdata.e: Don't enter the room without leave.

sdata.j: ↑喫煙↑↓きつえん↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓は、↑他↑↓た↓の↑皆↑↓みな↓と↑同様↑↓どうよう↓に、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓↑達↑↓たち↓の↑趣味↑↓しゅみ↓の↑欠点↑↓けってん↓に↑気↑↓き↓づいて|はいる|のだが、↑２↑↓ふた↓つの↑理由↑↓りゆう↓から、そうしたことを↑知↑↓し↓っていても↑何↑↓なに↓とか↑気↑↓き↓にしないようにしているのである。
sdata.e: Smokers are as aware as anybody else of the disadvantages of their hobby, but manage to live with that knowledge for two main reasons.

sdata.j: ↑気↑↓き↓に↑入↑↓にゅう↓ろうが↑入↑↓|はい↓る|まいが、↑君↑↓きみ↓は↑行↑↓い↓かねばならない。
sdata.e: Whether you like it or not, you have to go.

sdata.j: ↑間↑↓ま↓もなくそこでは↑乾季↑↓かんき↓に↑入↑↓|はい↓る|だろう。
sdata.e: The dry season there will set in soon.

sdata.j: ↑寒↑↓さむ↓い↑季↑↓き↓↑節↑↓ぶし↓に↑入↑↓|はい↓る|と、↑体↑↓からだ↓の↑弱↑↓よわ↓い↑人↑↓ひと↓はとかく↑風邪↑↓かぜ↓を↑引↑↓ひ↓きやすい。
sdata.e: Those who are delicate in health are apt to catch a cold when the cold season sets in.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓のオーケストラに↑入↑↓|はい↓る|つもりなのだ。
sdata.e: I'm going to join the school orchestra.

sdata.j: ↑我々↑↓われわれ↓はその↑建物↑↓たてもの↓に↑入↑↓|はい↓る|↑秘密↑↓ひみつ↓の↑扉↑↓とびら↓を↑発見↑↓はっけん↓した。
sdata.e: We found a secret door into the building.
